properties.label: byte
properties.info:
Params: [s, i, j]
Returns the internal numerical codes of the characters in the string s, starting at position i and up to position j (inclusive).

properties.label: char
properties.info:
Params: [...]
Returns a string containing the characters that have the internal numerical codes passed as arguments.

properties.label: dump
properties.info:
Params: [function]
Returns a string containing a binary representation of the function.

properties.label: find
properties.info:
Params: [s, pattern, init, plain]
Searches for the first occurrence of pattern in the string s. Returns the start and end indices of the match.

properties.label: format
properties.info:
Params: [formatstring, ...]
Returns a formatted version of the string similar to the C function sprintf.

properties.label: gmatch
properties.info:
Params: [s, pattern]
Returns an iterator function that can be used in a for loop to iterate over all occurrences of the pattern in the string s.

properties.label: gsub
properties.info:
Params: [s, pattern, repl, n]
Replaces occurrences of the pattern in string s with the replacement string repl. Optionally, the number of replacements can be limited by n.

properties.label: len
properties.info:
Params: [s]
Returns the length of the string s.

properties.label: lower
properties.info:
Params: [s]
Returns a copy of the string s with all its characters converted to lowercase.

properties.label: match
properties.info:
Params: [s, pattern, init]
Searches for the first match of pattern in string s and returns the match.

properties.label: rep
properties.info:
Params: [s, n]
Returns a string that is the concatenation of n copies of string s.

properties.label: reverse
properties.info:
Params: [s]
Returns a string with the characters of s reversed.

properties.label: sub
properties.info:
Params: [s, i, j]
Returns the substring of s from position i to position j (inclusive).

properties.label: upper
properties.info:
Params: [s]
Returns a copy of the string s with all its characters converted to uppercase.

properties.label: string
properties.info: The Lua string library contains functions for string manipulation.

properties.label: match
properties.info:
Params: [s, pattern, init]
Looks for a pattern in the string and returns the result of the match.

properties.label: reverse
properties.info:
Params: [s]
Returns a string with the characters of s reversed.

properties.label: find
properties.info:
Params: [s, pattern, init, plain]
Finds the first match of a pattern in string s and returns the indices of the match.

properties.label: sub
properties.info:
Params: [s, i, j]
Returns a substring of s from the ith to the jth position.
